entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
